New Records: Anthony Davis scored a career-high 35 points in the preseason game against the Suns
Key Match Events: The Lakers secured a 128-122 win in overtime
Dalton Knecht exploded for 35 points, helping LA secure the win
Pre-Game Insights: Lakers head coach JJ Redick shared that the team intends to fully utilize Anthony Davis on both offense and defense
Lakers insider Jovan Buha noted that Davis appeared more assertive during the preseason
Post-Match Reflections: Anthony Davis' 35 points marked his highest output in this year's preseason, surpassing his previous best of 24
Davis was instrumental in the first half, finishing with 17 points and six rebounds
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game began with a fast pace, as the Lakers edged out the Suns 35-30 in the first quarter
The Suns outscored LA by 10 in the second period for a 67-62 lead at halftime
Others: Anthony Davis was named to the NBA All-Defensive First Team, marking his fifth selection to an all-defensive team in his 12-year career
